actions.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Mr. Serrano demanded a separate vote on the Smith (NJ) amendment (A005).
On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 354 - 72 (Roll no. 182).

description: Amendment increases the authorization for Radio Free Asia by $40 million in order to provide for 24-hour broadcasting.
purpose: An amendment to express the sense of the Congress that the United States broadcasting through Radio Free Asia and Voice of America increase to continuous, 24-hour broadcasting in Mandarin, Cantonese, Tibetan, and that broadcasting in additional Chinese dialects be increased.
